description:
Chilly active days call for a breathable softshell. Whether they're at school track practice or learning to skate ski, the breathable Flex softshell provides warmth and weather-resistance without causing them to overheat when they're working up a sweat.

  • Polyester softshell fabric is weather-resistant and has a brushed interior for warmth
  • Soft brushed tricot on inside collar, storm flap and chin guard for comfort against the skin
  • Paneled construction and articulated elbows allow full range of motion
  • Elastic bindings on cuffs and collar seal out drafts
  • Name label on the inside helps make those games of “whose is whose” a bit easier
name: MEC Flex Nordic Softshell Jacket - Youths
